\Aura\Autoload

\Aura\AutoloadLoader

An SPL autoloader adhering to [PSR-0](https://github.com/php-fig/fig-standards/blob/master/accepted/PSR-0.md) and <https://wiki.php.net/rfc/splclassloader>.

Tags

todo

Constants

MODE_SILENT

MODE_SILENT

Operational mode where no exceptions are thrown under error conditions.

Tags

const
todo

MODE_NORMAL

MODE_NORMAL

Operational mode where an exception is thrown when a class file is not found.

Tags

const
todo

MODE_DEBUG

MODE_DEBUG

Operational mode where an exception is thrown when a class file is not found, or if after loading the file the class is still not declared.

Tags

const
todo

$loaded : array

Classes and interfaces loaded by the autoloader; the key is the class name and the value is the file name.

Type

todo

add()

add(string $prefix, array|string $paths) : void

Adds a directory path for a class name prefix.

Parameters

string $prefix

The class name prefix, e.g. 'Aura\Framework\' or 'Zend_'.
array|string $paths

The directory path leading to the classes with that prefix, e.g. '/path/to/system/package/Aura.Framework-dev/src'. Note that the classes must thereafter be in subdirectories of their own, e.g. `'/Aura/Framework/'.

Tags

todo

setPaths()

setPaths(array $paths)

Sets all class name prefixes and their paths. This overwrites the existing mappings.

Paths can a string or an array. For example:

 $loader->setPaths([
     'Zend_'=> '/path/to/zend/library',
     'Aura\\' => [
         '/path/to/project/Aura.Router/src/',
         '/path/to/project/Aura.Di/src/'
     ],
     'Vendor\\' => [
         '/path/to/project/Vendor.Package/src/',
     ],
     'Symfony\Component' => 'path/to/Symfony/Component',
 ]);

Parameters

array $paths

An associative array of class names and paths.

Tags

todo

getPaths()

getPaths() : array

Returns the list of all class name prefixes and their paths.

Returns

array

Tags

todo

setClass()

setClass(string $class, string $path) : void

Sets the exact file path for an exact class name.

Parameters

string $class

The exact class name.
string $path

The file path to that class.

Tags

todo

setClasses()

setClasses(array $classes) : void

Sets all file paths for all class names; this overwrites all previous exact mappings.

Parameters

array $classes

An array of class-to-file mappings where the key is the class name and the value is the file path.

Tags

todo

addClasses()

addClasses(array $classes) : void

Adds file paths for class names to the existing exact mappings.

Parameters

array $classes

An array of class-to-file mappings where the key is the class name and the value is the file path.

Tags

todo

getClasses()

getClasses() : array

Returns the list of exact class names and their paths.

Returns

array

Tags

todo

getLoaded()

getLoaded() : array

Returns the list of classes and interfaces loaded by the autoloader.

Returns

array —

An array of key-value pairs where the key is the class or interface name and the value is the file name.

Tags

todo

load()

load(string $spec) : void

Loads a class or interface using the class name prefix and path, falling back to the include-path if not found.

Parameters

string $spec

The class or interface to load.

Throws

\Aura\Autoload\Exception\AlreadyLoaded

in debug mode when the class is already loaded

\Aura\Autoload\Exception\NotReadable

when the file for the class or interface is not found.

\Aura\Autoload\Exception\NotDeclared

in debug mode when the class is not declared

Tags

todo

find()

find(string $spec) : string

Finds the path to a class or interface using the class prefix paths and include-path.

Parameters

string $spec

The class or interface to find.

Returns

string —

The absolute path to the class or interface.

Tags

todo

classToFile()

classToFile(string $spec) : string

PSR-0 compliant class-to-file inflector.

Parameters

string $spec

The name of the class or interface to load.

Returns

string —

The filename version of the class or interface.

Tags

todo
